BENEFICIARY_NAME_EN: First Nations of Quebec and Labrador Sustainable Development Institute
PROJECT_DESC_EN: This project is to develop a comprehensive portrait of the waste management infrastructure and practices for 30 Quebec First Nations.

PROJECT_NAME_EN: Development of a Circuit Rider Training Program for Waste
PROJECT_DESC_EN: 1) Assess need and interest in a training program; 2) Develop the First Nations of Quebec and Labrador Sustainable Development Institute trainer training; 3) Production of documents of /awareness training; 4) Technical support in communities; 5) Participation.

BENEFICIARY_NAME_EN: First Nations Adult Education School Council
PROJECT_NAME_EN: College Certification in Housing Management Techniques
PROJECT_DESC_EN: Support for the creation of a college certification in housing management techniques.
This project is to develop waste capacity building and provide waste operator training.

BENEFICIARY_NAME_EN: British Columbia Housing and Infrastructure Council
PROJECT_DESC_EN: The Community Infrastructure Branch is working with several First Nations-led organizations to establish lines of evidence to support transformation of infrastructure service delivery to First Nations communities. Activities include engagement with communities and First Nations organizations and development and evaluation of concept design.
